channel.title: Frugoo Scape - "NULL" Players! - Help me
channel.description: When i open the player interface window. It shows null as some players. I am to lazy and i wanted to know if someone has the code to fix it. I don't want to program it from scratch. If you know how to fix it please help me. Thanks, Frugoo Scape

item.title: Frugoo Scape - "NULL" Players! - Help me
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

yes compiled … and upload onto server via ftp… and then i restarted app.
noo… but look.

if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { <- makes log out
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.players[playerId] = null; < makes null when logged out
return;
}

then i should use…
if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) {
disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.players[playerId] != null;
return;
}

Read full topic

@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Did you save & compile? Lols.

Make sure you restart the server & when you compile there are no errors.

		if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) {
			[b]disconnected = true;[/b]
			PlayerHandler.players[b][playerId] = null;[/b]
			return;
		}

Think about thaT.

item.title: Frugoo Scape - "NULL" Players! - Help me
item.dc:creator: @93dcthugs93 93dcthugs93
item.description:
@93dcthugs93 wrote:

Purpose: To get rid of nulls on your server.

Difficulty: 1/10

Assumed Knowledge: know how to search, copy+paste.

Server Base: Should work on all

Classes Modified: Client.java

Procedure

Step 1: [i]look for your run() method in your client.java,
find this if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { disconnected = true; return; }
Once you find that replace wit this:

if(inStream.readUnsignedByte() != 14) { disconnected = true; PlayerHandler.players[playerId] = null; return; }

& thats it… Gets rid of your server nulls.

Read full topic
